$WmMPID_年明スリーズ,ch00_10_Cerise_F_NewYear19,Face|There we go! If your obi comes
untied again, just let me know,
all right?$k$p$WmMPID_年明レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_NewYear19,Face|Thank you...$k$pYou're...Princess Fjorm's elder sister.
You are kind...$k$pMy sister... She is also kind.$k$p$WmMPID_年明スリーズ,ch00_10_Cerise_F_NewYear19,Face|You think the world of your sister,
don't you?$k$p$WmMPID_年明レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_NewYear19,Face|To thank you for fixing my obi...I will
smash our opponents with this
kumade. Here they come...$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_年明レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_NewYear19,Face|We lost. I...lost.$k$p$WmMPID_年明スリーズ,ch00_10_Cerise_F_NewYear19,Face|There's no need to be so hard on
yourself. Let's join up with Fjorm
and your sister, shall we?$k$p$WmMPID_年明レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_NewYear19,Face|All right.$k$p$Sbs150|
